What should I do if I have last launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to 0.5.9 on Linux?

You should delete the following directories before running the new update:
```
~/.komodo/VRSCTEST
~/.verustest
```
This is necessary because the testnet was deleted and relaunched on the 0.5.9 release.
